altername_name: Bass Rush Dream: EcoGear PowerWorm Championship
name: Bass Rush: Ecogear PowerWorm Championship
overview: Bass Rush: ECOGEAR Powerworm Championship is a fishing video game released for the Dreamcast and Nintendo 64. This version was a Japan exclusive and is compatible with both rumble pack and fishing rod. The murky waters are well suited to the N64’s fogging abilities and the results are a very savory sports title reeling in the likes of Get Bass hook, line and sinker.
